comments:
It appears that we should short circuit the debug view to not attempt to show a 
marker that no longer exists.  Running the test suite I am getting

4 org.eclipse.ui 0 Exception creating image descriptor for:

Looks like this was actually a search marker that was being re-painted. Not a 
debug marker.
